attributes.action: turn Post Offices into "Mail Collection Centres"
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Instead of closing Post Offices we should stop postal deliveries, and turn  the post offices into "Mail Collection Centres" as this will encourage community interaction; and increase the footfall to improve viability.  Special arrangements could be made for housebound people; and existing postmen and women could be re-deployed as sorters, customer servers, and sales persons.
